meanings.definition: A place of entertainment open at night for drinking, dancing, and socializing.
meanings.sent1: Last night, we went to the nightclub to dance with our friends.
meanings.sent2: The nightclub was crowded with people enjoying music and drinks.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally wore my slippers to the nightclub, and everyone laughed at me.
meanings.sent4: The nightclub was a beacon of light in the darkness, drawing in partygoers like moths.
meanings.sent5: The neon lights of the nightclub illuminated the street, inviting us inside.

meanings.definition: To go to or spend time in a nightclub.
meanings.sent1: Let's nightclub tonight and have a great time together.
meanings.sent2: She loves to nightclub on weekends to unwind after a long week.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe he wants to nightclub every single night!
meanings.sent4: After a stressful day, she decided to nightclub to relax and have fun.
meanings.sent5: They planned to nightclub until the early hours of the morning, enjoying the music and atmosphere.
